useCase.name: Developing Prototypes Based on Initial Hypotheses

mainSequence.step: Request initial hypotheses from Project Manager.
Receive 3 initial hypotheses from User Research Team.
Query existing insights on hypotheses from Github.
Discuss feasibility and resources with Project Manager.
Confirm prototype development with Project Manager.
Determine technology stack based on hypotheses.
Create new branch for prototype development on Github.
Develop prototypes based on each hypothesis.
Commit prototypes for team review on Github.
Notify Project Manager on prototype completion.
Organize prototype review session with User Research Team.
